title: Day 1052
content:
# Day 1052

> **"Not what we have, but what we enjoy, constitutes our abundance."**
 - Epicurus

Man, I love this quote. Simple yet profound, and so easy to overlook.

As a kid, $20 felt like a fortune. I could walk into a gas station and go hog wild, grabbing snacks and drinks like I was a king. Now? Well, there's a whole discussion to be had about inflation, but even setting that aside, $100 today doesn't feel like much because it does not even cover my utility bills. Perspective is everything.

But just because life gets more expensive doesn't mean I should take what I have for granted. There's still so much to be grateful for. True wealth isn't just in numbers it's in appreciation.

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1887463909583393176](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1887463909583393176)](https://miro.medium.com/1*eotHD4CjJAVbUjSeBAo2tg.png)

2/6/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
